title: Several Lots of T206 Cards For Sale
author: Cy2009

posts.post_title: Several Lots of T206 Cards For Sale
posts.post_content:
Hi,

I am selling off a bunch of my T206 cards. I want to sell them in groups and not individually. So I am splitting them up in grades for the sale. I will prefer to be paid with a US Postal money order (No PayPal). I will accept a check, but I will hold the cards until the check clears. If you pay with a US Postal money order, I will ship the cards on the same day that I receive the payment.

You can view all of the cards on my web-site. 
The link is: [url]http://www.cyscards.com/t206.htm[/url]

(Don't ask about the PSA 5 cards. They're all sold.)

You can contact me at: [url]cy@cyscards.com[/url]

Here is the breakdown with prices:

Cy

Update on the T206 Lots:

The SGC 40 Lot has been sold and the SGC 30 Lot has been sold.

Thanks for offers on these two lots.

The SGC 60 Lot and the SGC 50 Lot are still available.

Cy
